activity.title: beckn/beckn-ui-workspace#3800
activity.text:
Hi @viraj89 ,

I'm Riya Kumari, a first-year student deeply interested in open source and AI-driven frontend development.

I came across the “No-Code AI-Enabled Catalog Generator” project under Beckn through C4GT, and I’m genuinely excited about the mission to make Beckn UIs more accessible. The idea of empowering non-tech users to build Beckn-compatible apps using natural language is powerful, and I’d love to contribute to building that future.

I’m comfortable with JavaScript and React, and I’m currently learning LangChain and LLM APIs as I go. I’m especially drawn to the drag-and-drop state machine UI, and I’m confident I can add value to the frontend and prompt-handling flows.

Could you please guide me on the setup process beyond the README, and if there’s any good first issue to begin with? Also, is there a Slack or Discord where contributors are coordinating?

Looking forward to working with you and contributing meaningfully!

Warm regards,
Riya
